commit message: Added tag v2.2.2 for changeset 0f0c6e8e44ed
Command screenshot, not registered in MainService (only a POC)
Merge

Screen shot command is now working.
Todo : manage args, saving location...
Adding ScreenShot command as hidden in mainservice
Auto cancel file transfer if stream negociation take up to 30s
Save screenshots in Pictures directory. Put the date in filename as unique identifier.
Update authors file with role
Updating change log with screenshot command
use primitive type counters instead of date objects
use the app local cache dir for the ram framebuffer dump
screenshot command uses now the phone specific resolution
Screenshot ask root
code cleanup and refactoring
improved logs of file transfer
Better API dedection
small fix
disable local socks5 proxy, as android disallows local port listeners
Add BROWSABLE category to the http listener

only send presence status strings if the notification address is available
handle xmpp subscription requests from the notification address and check the subscription status on connection start
drop the use camera lines, so that gtalksms can be installed again on devices without a  camera
Prepare version 2.2.3
